ABOUT_ME.IM: I'm Ramiro Gumma, a FullStack MERN developer
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: Since my beginnings in the world of web development, I have been driven by an unwavering desire for learning and continuous improvement. My education includes studies at Coderhouse, backed by certifications from LinkedIn, FreeCodeCamp, and HackerRank, demonstrating my dedication and technical skills.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION_2: My current focus is on the most relevant technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React, and Next.js. Additionally, I have solid experience using tools like Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, AWS, WebSocket, Socket.io, Nodemailer, Strapi, and Stripe for backend development, as well as React, Tailwind, Framer Motion, and Axios for frontend development.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION_3: What sets me apart is my ability to adapt quickly to management methodologies, allowing me to provide fast and effective solutions to meet my clients' needs. Additionally, my English level is B1, which allows me to communicate effectively in professional settings and work in international teams. My main goal is to deliver exceptional results that not only meet but exceed expectations.
